label: A2B_tP48_130_2g_g-001
title: Room Temperature Metastable VO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
While the ground state of VO$_{2}$ is similar to \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP12_14_2e_e-001}{baddeleyite ($C43$)} (Villars, 2018), there are several metastable states (Oka, 1998), including this structure, seen at 298K, and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tI24_87_2h_h-001}{another tetragonal structure} seen at 473K. 
 It has also been seen in the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC_mP12_14_e_e_e-002}{arsenopyrite $E0_{7}$ structure}.
